title: 09/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
A huge week 1 of the NFL season where Colin compares the off seasons of Aaron Rodgers and Russell Wilson and what impact that had on the start of the regular season. He discusses Baker Mayfield’s duel against Patrick Mahomes and how Mayfield was ultimately exposed. He also tells you why he was right about Sam Darnold and wrong about the Eagles. Plus, 3-time Pro Bowl QB Carson Palmer joins the show to give his thoughts on what he saw from week 1 including Mayfield and Rodgers. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
